name: Ziiro.1
description:
You don't have any memories, only nightmares. Let's see how long you can run away from them ...


Ziiro.1 is a game produced in 3 days during the Ludum dare 2021 and made by 8 students, from different classes.

In this solo game, you will have to rush through your own subconscious to escape the crual reality. Be aware and responsive in order to dodge all your bad thoughts and reach your ideal.

During your experience, you will have to take advantage of the jump system to have the best possible timing. You may use the walls too.

- Discover a deep and abstract world

- A dynamic gameplay accessible to all

- Try to do your best thanks to the great replayability of the game

Use Z/Q/S/D to moove, space to jump, your mouse to aim and that's it!


  • Cedric Arnoux
  • Lucas Rasson
  • Théo Balicour
  • Abdelbari Berrim
  • Mathis Calmettes
  • Liam Alliaume-Desnoues
  • Loïck Gombauld
  • Karim Ballan
